testsuite.name: com.paySecure.testngClass.report

testcase.name: allActionOnTransactionPage
testcase.system-out: Click on the Last Action Button in transaction Table Verified transaction id test is present on Last action Click on the Cancel Button Click on the History Button in transaction Table Click on the Cancel Button Click on the Remarks Button in transaction Table Veirifies Transaction ID on Remarks page is disabled Click on the Cancel Button Click on the Remarks Button in transaction Table Click on the send message Button Verify error message Click on the OK Button Click on the Remarks Button in transaction Table Click on the Cancel Button Click on the Remarks Button in transaction Table when user click on Remarks then at initial stage select user type field is disabled User select values from user type dropdown After selecting user type values then Select user type field is enabled User select a error User enter Error message is Message Field User click on send message button Message sent successfully is verified Click on OK button on success message

testsuite.system-out: Click on Report Module Click on Transaction Sub Module Click on the Last Action Button in transaction Table Verified transaction id test is present on Last action Click on the Cancel Button Click on the History Button in transaction Table Click on the Cancel Button Click on the Remarks Button in transaction Table Veirifies Transaction ID on Remarks page is disabled Click on the Cancel Button Click on the Remarks Button in transaction Table Click on the send message Button Verify error message Click on the OK Button Click on the Remarks Button in transaction Table Click on the Cancel Button Click on the Remarks Button in transaction Table when user click on Remarks then at initial stage select user type field is disabled User select values from user type dropdown After selecting user type values then Select user type field is enabled User select a error User enter Error message is Message Field User click on send message button Message sent successfully is verified Click on OK button on success message
